titleStmt.title: A declaration and warning to all the members of this Kirk, from the Commission of the General Assembly. Together with a postscript, appointing a solemn day of Thanksgiving the twenty fifth of May 1649, for the utter routing of the strength of the rebels army in the north of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland. General Assembly. Commission.

notesStmt.note: Reprint. Originally published: Edinburgh, printed by Evan Tyler, printer to the Kings most Excellent Maiestie. 1649.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
